c1.name: Thundering Might
c1.descriptionRaw: Recasting <color=#FFD780FF>Stellar Restoration</color> while a Lightning Stiletto is present causes Keqing to deal 50% of her ATK as <color=#FFACFFFF>AoE Electro DMG</color> at the start point and terminus of her Blink.
c1.description: Recasting Stellar Restoration while a Lightning Stiletto is present causes Keqing to deal 50% of her ATK as AoE Electro DMG at the start point and terminus of her Blink.

c2.name: Keen Extraction
c2.descriptionRaw:
When Keqing's Normal and Charged Attacks hit opponents affected by <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro</color>, they have a 50% chance of producing an Elemental Particle.
This effect can only occur once every 5s.
c2.description:
When Keqing's Normal and Charged Attacks hit opponents affected by Electro, they have a 50% chance of producing an Elemental Particle.
This effect can only occur once every 5s.

c3.name: Foreseen Reformation
c3.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Starward Sword</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c3.description:
Increases the Level of Starward Sword by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Attunement
c4.descriptionRaw: For 10s after Keqing triggers an <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro-related Elemental Reaction</color>, her ATK is increased by 25%.
c4.description: For 10s after Keqing triggers an Electro-related Elemental Reaction, her ATK is increased by 25%.

c5.name: Beckoning Stars
c5.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Stellar Restoration</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c5.description:
Increases the Level of Stellar Restoration by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Tenacious Star
c6.descriptionRaw:
When initiating a Normal Attack, a Charged Attack, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst, Keqing gains a 6% <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG Bonus</color> for 8s.
Effects triggered by Normal Attacks, Charged Attacks, Elemental Skills and Elemental Bursts are considered independent entities.
c6.description:
When initiating a Normal Attack, a Charged Attack, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst, Keqing gains a 6% Electro DMG Bonus for 8s.
Effects triggered by Normal Attacks, Charged Attacks, Elemental Skills and Elemental Bursts are considered independent entities.
